Thomas 216 East Annex University of Maine Orono, ME. 04469 jthoma54@maine.maine.edu To Whom It May Concern: My name is Jonathan Thomas. I am a Graduate Student in The Computer Science Department at the University of Maine. I am currently working on the Starlogo Project. What is StarLogo? StarLogo is a programming environment. StarLogo is a 'parallel' Logo which supports the creation of visually intense simulations and models. The StarLogo Project is the port of StarLogo from the Mac to the PC. Want to check it out? Go to www.asap.um.maine.edu/starlogo . I am the T.A. for Cos 120: Introduction to Programming Using Pascal. I am currently enrolled in Cos 331: Operating Systems, Cos 301: Programming Languages, and Cos 520: Software Engineering. My wife, Kris, is also a graduate of UVM. My other interests/hobbies/likes include: hiking, good music (Hot Tuna, Dead, Airplane, Stones, Janis Joplin, etc., etc. Need to know more? Click here for links to stuff. Click here to see some pictures. Click here to send me mail. Sincerely, Jonathan Thomas
